name: Happy Shield Machine Hell Adventure
description:
CONTROLS:

RMB - move 

LMB - grab projectile

mouse - shield direction aim.

Happy Shield Machine Hell Adventure - is an 'unconventional' wave-based survival shooter - see how many waves you can survive against increasing numbers of enemy waves.

(we ran out of time  )

H. S. M. H. A. was made for a MashUp game jam 2 game with a theme "Unconventional means"
